oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Remembering Linda Seger
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: N/A, N/A
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Linda L. (Mcintyre) Seger, 65, of Morgantown passed on Friday, January 10, 2014 at her home in West Virginia.Many of you may know Linda as the managerof the APA Fundamentals of Aviculture, online classes. Linda, along with Rick Jordan, developedour educational online campus and made it a reality. She continued on as the manager and student liaison, enrolling students and helping to solve any problems they may have "head .· during their enrollment. Linda was a "techie" and loved to design websites.She had her own hosting site and helped many avian businesses to design and set up their web pages. She was involved with many avicultural organizations and kept a small collection of birds in her home. She had a passion for Lories.
